article_title: Abbe Gluck's Defense Of King V. Burwell Echoes The Court's Pretextualism

article_metadata.description: Gluck helpfully acknowledges that the majority’s approach in King is “essentially the opposite” of how the Court had previously approached such cases.
article_metadata.author: Michael F. Cannon
